PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13352013-12-05,  ,  ,  ,  NR,  CRA
ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS in order to (1) respond to the request of the Government of Ontario; (2) implement the agreement between the Government of Ontario and the Government of Canada; and (3) align the pension treatment of Ontario part-time Crown appointees with other provincial part-time Crown appointees.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0233 Publication Date: 2013-12-18
AttachmentsAttachment
